message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.SD, cs.HC 

Reasoning: The paper discusses the automated generation of scripted dialogue, which involves natural language processing and artificial intelligence techniques. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language). Additionally, the paper also touches upon dialogue processing, which falls under the sub-category cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence). The study of strategies for automated generation of dialogue also involves machine learning techniques, which could be categorized under cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also discusses the potential applications of automated dialogue generation in human-computer interaction, which could be classified under cs.SD (Sound). Finally, the paper discusses the bi-directional communication between characters in scripted dialogue, which could be relevant to the sub-category cs.HC (Human-Computer Interaction).
